definitions.meaning: [c]保守的说法；不充分的叙述a statement that makes sth seem less important, impressive, serious, etc. than it really is

examples.content:
To say we were pleased is an understatement(= we were extremely pleased) .
说我们高兴，那是轻描淡写。

definitions.meaning: [u]淡化；低调说法the practice of making things seem less impressive, important, serious, etc. than they really are

examples.content:
typical English understatement
典型的英国式低调说法
